item.description:
The Wyoma Lions club of Lynn is sponsoring a fundraiser for the Japan Earthquake Relief.  Let's go out and support this worthy cause and have a great time.

Tickets are advance purchase for this event by April 20 so this event is going to take some advance planning. 

The price of the tickets includes a full course sit down meal with your choice of Chicken Cordon Bleu or Baked Schrod stuffed with Crabmeat Stuffing & a DJ for dancing.  There will also be raffles and 50/50 drawings.  We may even see some pigs fly tonight so keep your eyes open.

Price:  $35.00pp, advance tickets only****

Time:  7pm-midnight

For Tickets:  you must call Katie, one of our members to purchase tickets @ 617-680-5768.  When calling Katie please mention you are with the meetup group so that we can have tables reserved.  Remember ticket purchase deadline is April 20, 2011 No Exceptions.  Once you purchase your ticket, please update your rsvp to state "ticket purchased"

**** You can send your check to Wyoma Lions, P.O. Box 8064 Lynn, MA 01904

If you are running late or need to cancel at the last minute, please call the Meetup phone at 978-304-2811.

 

- そこを見てほしい

Donna & Janet
item.why: We will have a great time and also support a great cause
item.name: Japan Relief Fundraiser
